content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the next processing stage.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (60.5, -52.5) feeding fuel into the stone furnace.
- Burner Inserter at position (63.5, -52.5) transferring iron plates to the next stage or storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Insufficient Inventory Items
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. This will prevent errors such as "Could not insert: No coal to insert from your inventory."

### Errors Related to Entity Placement and Repositioning
- Verify the correct positioning of inserters and other entities before attempting to use them. Repeated repositioning may indicate an initial placement error.

### Errors When Entities Are Out of Fuel
- Regularly check and refuel entities like burner inserters and mining drills to prevent them from running out of fuel and halting production processes.
